title: BRIEF-Iress Says Signed Agreement With Emergency Services And State Super
text:
BRIEF-Iress Says Signed Agreement With Emergency Services And State Super

Stock Markets 3 minutes ago (Oct 28, 2019 12:29)

© Reuters. BRIEF-Iress Says Signed Agreement With Emergency Services And State Super Oct 28 (Reuters) - Iress Ltd : * IRESS LTD - IS OFFERING AN AUTOMATED ADMINISTRATION SERVICE TO IMPROVE EFFICIENCY AND MEMBER EXPERIENCE FOR SUPERANNUATION FUNDS * IRESS LTD - SIGNED AN AGREEMENT WITH EMERGENCY SERVICES AND STATE SUPER TO DELIVER SERVICE

BRIEF-Iress Says Signed Agreement With Emergency Services And State Super
